actor_awards.notes: Best known for her role as Mary Hatch in the holiday classic 'It's a Wonderful Life' and for her television series 'The Donna Reed Show'. Won the Best Supporting Actress Academy Award for 'From Here to Eternity', playing against type.

filmography.title: It's a Wonderful Life
filmography.role_description: The devoted and steadfast wife of George Bailey, who helps him realize the value of his life.
filmography.plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

filmography.title: From Here to Eternity
filmography.role_description: A nightclub hostess who falls in love with a private but struggles with her desire for a respectable life.
filmography.plot: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing in his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are having an affair.

filmography.title: The Donna Reed Show
filmography.role_description: The loving and capable matriarch of the Stone family in this long-running sitcom. (TV Series)
filmography.plot: The daily mishaps and adventures of a middle-class American family.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best TV Star - Female

filmography.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
filmography.role_description: The innocent niece of the painter Basil Hallward, who falls in love with the unaging Dorian Gray.
filmography.plot: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

filmography.title: They Were Expendable
filmography.role_description: An Army nurse who romances John Wayne's character during the defense of the Philippines.
filmography.plot: A PT boat company defends the Philippines against the Japanese invasion during World War II.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Sound, Best Special Effects

filmography.title: The Man from Laramie
filmography.role_description: A shopkeeper caught between the conflict of a newcomer and the powerful local cattle baron.
filmography.plot: A stranger defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.

filmography.title: Shadow of the Thin Man
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of a jockey who gets caught up in a murder investigation.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles investigate a murder at a racetrack involving a jockey and a gambling ring.

filmography.title: The Human Comedy
filmography.role_description: The daughter in a close-knit family dealing with the home front during WWII.
filmography.plot: A teenager in a small California town works as a telegraph messenger during World War II, delivering news of love and death.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Motion Picture Story

filmography.title: Green Dolphin Street
filmography.role_description: A woman who loses the man she loves to her sister due to a drunken mistake in a letter.
filmography.plot: A man drunkenly writes a letter proposing to the wrong sister, leading to years of complications in 19th-century New Zealand.

filmography.title: Chicago Deadline
filmography.role_description: A young woman found dead whose diary leads a reporter to uncover her tragic past.
filmography.plot: A reporter finds a diary on a dead woman and reconstructs her tragic life story.

filmography.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
filmography.role_description: The responsible sister who harbors a secret love for her sister's husband.
filmography.plot: An American writer recalls his romance with a wealthy American girl in post-WWII Paris.

filmography.title: The Benny Goodman Story
filmography.role_description: The high-society woman who marries the famous jazz clarinetist Benny Goodman.
filmography.plot: The life and career of clarinetist and bandleader Benny Goodman.

filmography.title: Scandal Sheet
filmography.role_description: A reporter who unknowingly investigates a murder committed by her own editor.
filmography.plot: An editor of a sensationalist tabloid accidentally kills his wife and tries to cover it up, while his best reporters investigate.

filmography.title: Ransom!
filmography.role_description: The distraught mother of a kidnapped boy who conflicts with her husband's decision not to pay.
filmography.plot: A wealthy executive's son is kidnapped, and he takes a controversial stand on television regarding the ransom.

filmography.title: Trouble Along the Way
filmography.role_description: A probation officer who investigates a football coach's suitability as a father.
filmography.plot: A disgraced football coach gets a second chance at a small Catholic college but faces custody issues with his daughter.

filmography.title: Hangman's Knot
filmography.role_description: A Union army nurse held hostage by a group of Confederate soldiers.
filmography.plot: Confederate soldiers rob a gold shipment, unaware the war has ended, and are trapped by a posse.

filmography.title: Eyes in the Night
filmography.role_description: A young woman involved with a Nazi spy ring, whose stepfather is a blind detective.
filmography.plot: A blind detective investigates a murder involving a Nazi spy ring.

filmography.title: Gun Fury
filmography.role_description: The fiancée of a pacifist rancher, who is kidnapped by outlaws.
filmography.plot: A pacifist is forced to take up arms to rescue his fiancée from a gang of outlaws.

filmography.title: Backlash
filmography.role_description: A woman searching for her husband's remains and a lost cache of gold in Apache territory.
filmography.plot: A gunman searches for the man who betrayed five men to Apaches, meeting a woman with her own agenda.

filmography.title: See Here, Private Hargrove
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of a clumsy reporter who is drafted into the army.
filmography.plot: A naive reporter gets drafted into World War II and tries to profit from his experiences.

filmography.title: Saturday's Hero
filmography.role_description: The wealthy girlfriend of a college football player who struggles with the sport's corruption.
filmography.plot: A high school football star gets a scholarship to a prestigious university but discovers the corruption behind the sport.

filmography.title: The Courtship of Andy Hardy
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a couple going through a bitter divorce, who Andy Hardy tries to help.
filmography.plot: Judge Hardy tries to help a couple reconcile while Andy falls for their daughter.

filmography.title: The Caddy
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who becomes the love interest of a gifted but shy golfer.
filmography.plot: A skilled golfer with a fear of crowds trains a friend to be a pro, leading to comedic situations.

filmography.title: Beyond Mombasa
filmography.role_description: An anthropologist's niece who joins an expedition in Africa.
filmography.plot: An adventurer goes to Africa to find his brother's mine and the truth about his death.

filmography.title: Apache Trail
filmography.role_description: A Spanish woman who works at a stagecoach station under threat of attack.
filmography.plot: An outlaw is released from prison to help his lawman brother defend a stagecoach station from Apaches.
